entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
